mapper.select: select customer_id,customer_number,customer_name,customer_is_used,version from t_customer where customer_id=#{customerId} order by sort_no
mapper.update: update t_customer set customer_is_used = #{customerIsUsed}, last_modified_by=#{lastModifiedBy}, version=version+1, gmt_modified=now() where customer_id=#{customerId}

update t_customer set customer_name=#{customerName}, customer_is_used=#{customerIsUsed}, version=version+1, last_modified_by=#{lastModifiedBy}, gmt_modified=now() where customer_id=#{customerId} and version=#{version}
